thread.title: All the Times Justin Timberlake Let His Freak Flag Fly at the Oscars

author: Victoria Messina
title: All the Times Justin Timberlake Let His Freak Flag Fly at the Oscars

persons.name: justin timberlake let his freak fla

text:
Justin Timberlake Funny Moments at the 2017 Oscars All the Times Justin Timberlake Let His Freak Flag Fly   All the Times Justin Timberlake Let His Freak Flag Fly at the Oscars 
Sure, there were tons of gorgeous gowns and beauty looks on the Oscars red carpet this year, but our favorite part of the preshow ceremony? Justin Timberlake showing his true colors as he made his way down the red carpet. Not only did the superstar look downright adorable alongside his wife , Jessica Biel , but he also acted like a total goofball on multiple occasions. Read on to see all his funniest moments that will make your love for him grow even more.
